title: That Time We Shorted America, Part Two
description: Everyone said betting against the entire stock market was a terrible idea. We did it anyway. Today, we find out the results, and revisit the first short ever done in the 17th century.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: That Time We Shorted America, Part Two
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: We shorted America, taking a bet against its entire stock market. Today, we find out the results, and revisit the very first person to short a stock back in the 17th century.
itunes:subtitle: We shorted America, taking a bet against its entire stock market. Today, we find out the results, and revisit the very first person to short a stock back in the 17th century.
content:encoded: Everyone said betting against the entire stock market was a terrible idea. We did it anyway. Today, we find out the results, and revisit the first short ever done in the 17th century.
